long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TikTok Blockout allows you to create a personalized blocklist of accounts you'd rather not see on your timeline. Whether it's to avoid spoilers, filter out negativity, or simply curate your feed to your preferences, TikBlock puts the power in your hands.

How to use : 

1.Fill Your Blocklist: Simply compile a list of TikTok account links that you wish to block. Copy and paste these links into easy-to-use interface.

2.Start Blocking: Once your blocklist is ready, hit the "Start Blocking" button. TikBlock will swiftly go through the list, ensuring that each account is promptly added to your blocklist.

3.Sit Back and Relax: Wait for TikTok Blockout to finish blocking all the accounts on your list.
